AboutMe.title: Who Am I?
AboutMe.content: Hi, my name is Tomasz Jelito and I am a full-stack web developer from Poland. I started my digital journey at the age of 12, learning the basics of programming and web design on my own. I'm currently in my 5th year of Computer Science technical school, developing my dream career of a freelancer. I never stop learning and follow technology trends to stay on top of what I do.

MyCompetence.title: Experience
MyCompetence.content1: When I was 12 years old, my older brother showed me that the computer is not only for gaming. That's when my adventure with programming began. I spent hundreds of hours learning the basics of C++ and algorithms from youtube.
MyCompetence.content2: In 2019 I started studying Computer Science at a technical school, where I am currently in my 5th year. During this time, I gained a lot of hands-on experience (I have done two internships) and knowledge about how computers work and how to develop websites and web applications.
MyCompetence.content3: In 2023 I focused on developing my career towards freelancing and took my first commercial assignments.

AboutPreview.title: Check me out
AboutPreview.content1: I'm from Poland, but I also speak English
AboutPreview.content2: I've been programming for over 6 years now

WhatDoIDo.description1: Design, development, hosting, support and management.
WhatDoIDo.description2: Everything tailored to your needs and requirements.
WhatDoIDo.description3: Consulting on websites and web applications.

CallToAction.title: Got a job for me?
CallToAction.description: Are you looking for a freelancer to develop your new website? Or maybe you need an extra programmer on your team?

PortfolioPreview.title: My portfolio
PortfolioPreview.description: Check out my recent projects on the portfolio subpage. More of my projects along with the source code you can also find on my Github.

PortfolioProjects.agency_description: A demonstration website for a Digital Marketing Agency. For the frontend, I used Next JS and Mantine UI. For the backend, I used Django and PostgreSQL. Everything connected through a REST API.
PortfolioProjects.portfolio_description: My personal website you are looking at right now. For this project I used Next JS and Mantine UI.
PortfolioProjects.akademia_description: Website for a local volleyball academy. This website is based on the Wordpress system.
PortfolioProjects.akupunktura_description: Website with appointment booking for acupuncture office. This website is based on Wordpress system.
PortfolioProjects.kniha_description: Simple personal website for badminton player and instructor. This website is built using HTML and CSS only.
